context: 3. Investments in subsidiaries The additions in the year and prior year relate to equity-settled share-based payments granted to the employees of subsidiary companies. Subsidiary undertakings are disclosed within note 35 to the consolidated financial statements.

questions.d441a136-0168-4457-8fc8-05eb974388d1: What do the additions in the year and prior year relate to?
questions.a75bb0b1-4fb1-405c-b2f1-1df4ee3cc9be: What are the components factored in the calculation of investments in subsidiaries at end of the period?
questions.abfc722d-6235-4ed2-81b3-90b25b3cd93c: In which year were Additions larger?
questions.14381fab-36ac-482b-9f77-2c78f3f34ffb: What was the change in Additions in 2019 from 2018?
questions.20092aeb-d39f-4b50-b927-0602b8a95c08: What was the percentage change in Additions in 2019 from 2018?
